message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $13,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $10,800?
